channel.title: Epicurus
channel.description:
When i start the Epicurus client i get this error (i build it in eclipse)
http://prntscr.com/1t7gtk
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at epicurus.Client.processOnDemandQueue(Client.java:3220) at epicurus.Client.processGameLoop(Client.java:2605) at epicurus.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:118) at epicurus.Client.run(Client.java:5281) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
